_description: Pray for Peace (c. 1499) — one stanza (ababcc) with four-line burden: ‘Jhesu for thy mercy endelesse / Saue thy pepill and sende vs pesse (repeated), ten lines in all’

BLAdd5665.Transcription:
Jhesu for thy wondes fyffSaue fro shedyng cristayn blodeSese all
                    grete trobil of malice & stryffe& of our neighbores sende vus
                    tydynges godeBlessed JhesuBlessed Jhesu
